item.title: Warm Evenings, Warmer Posts
item.description: Welcome Back I sincerly hope you enjoyed reading my first post! Since my first post, I have learned a couple things: I had not secured my site on Netlify (oops) Securing it was very easy after I got it going Git was much easier than I originally thought These all seem like very integral lessons to me! I think I may have had a breakthrough in what I would consider for my ultimate goal: SysAdmin
